name.th: เครื่องตรวจจับธีม WP
name.vi: Trình phát hiện chủ đề WP

short.ar: اكتشف بسهولة سمات مواقع الويب الخاصة بـ WordPress وShopify وDrupal وSquarespace وPrestashop باستخدام هذه الأداة المجانية
short.am: የ WordPress፣ Shopify፣ Drupal፣ Squarespace እና Prestashop የድር ጣቢያ ገጽታዎችን በዚህ ነፃ መሳሪያ በቀላሉ ያግኙ።
short.bg: Откривайте лесно теми за уебсайтове за WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace и Prestashop с този безплатен инструмент
short.bn: এই বিনামূল্যের টুলের সাহায্যে WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace এবং Prestashop-এর জন্য ওয়েবসাইট থিমগুলি সহজেই সনাক্ত করুন
short.ca: Detecteu fàcilment temes de llocs web per a WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace i Prestashop amb aquesta eina gratuïta
short.cs: Pomocí tohoto bezplatného nástroje snadno zjistěte témata webových stránek pro WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace a Prestashop
short.da: Find nemt webstedstemaer til WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace og Prestashop med dette gratis værktøj
short.de: Mit diesem kostenlosen Tool können Sie ganz einfach Website-Themen für WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace und Prestashop…
short.el: Εντοπίστε εύκολα θέματα ιστότοπου για WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace και Prestashop με αυτό το δωρεάν εργαλείο
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Easily detect website themes for WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace, and Prestashop with this free tool
short.es,es_419: Detecte fácilmente temas de sitios web para WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace y Prestashop con esta herramienta gratuita
short.et: Selle tasuta tööriista abil saate hõlpsalt tuvastada veebisaitide teemad WordPressi, Shopify, Drupali, Squarespace'i ja Prestashopi…
short.fa: با این ابزار رایگان، به راحتی تم های وب سایت را برای WordPress، Shopify، Drupal، Squarespace و Prestashop شناسایی کنید.
short.fi: Tunnista helposti WordPressin, Shopifyn, Drupalin, Squarespacen ja Prestashopin verkkosivustoteemat tällä ilmaisella työkalulla
short.fil: Madaling makita ang mga tema ng website para sa WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace, at Prestashop gamit ang libreng tool na ito
short.fr: Détectez facilement les thèmes de sites Web pour WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace et Prestashop avec cet outil gratuit
short.gu: આ ફ્રી ટૂલ વડે WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace અને Prestashop માટે વેબસાઇટ થીમ સરળતાથી શોધો
short.he: זהה בקלות ערכות נושא של אתרים עבור WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace ו-Prestashop עם הכלי החינמי הזה
short.hi: इस निःशुल्क टूल से वर्डप्रेस, शॉपिफाई, ड्रुपल, स्क्वैरस्पेस और प्रेस्टैशॉप के लिए वेबसाइट थीम का आसानी से पता लगाएं
short.hr: S ovim besplatnim alatom jednostavno otkrijte teme web stranica za WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace i Prestashop
short.hu: Könnyen felismerheti a WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace és Prestashop webhelytémáit ezzel az ingyenes eszközzel
short.id: Deteksi tema situs web untuk WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace, dan Prestashop dengan mudah menggunakan alat gratis ini
short.it: Rileva facilmente i temi dei siti Web per WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace e Prestashop con questo strumento gratuito
short.ja: この無料ツールを使用すると、WordPress、Shopify、Drupal、Squarespace、Prestashop の Web サイトのテーマを簡単に検出できます
short.kn: ಈ ಉಚಿತ ಉಪಕರಣದೊಂದಿಗೆ ವರ್ಡ್ಪ್ರೆಸ್, ಶಾಪಿಫೈ, ದ್ರುಪಾಲ್, ಸ್ಕ್ವೇರ್‌ಸ್ಪೇಸ್ ಮತ್ತು ಪ್ರೆಸ್ಟಾಶಾಪ್‌ಗಾಗಿ ವೆಬ್‌ಸೈಟ್ ಥೀಮ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಸುಲಭವಾಗಿ ಪತ್ತೆ ಮಾಡಿ
short.ko: 이 무료 도구를 사용하여 WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace 및 Prestashop의 웹사이트 테마를 쉽게 감지하세요.
short.lt: Lengvai aptikkite „WordPress“, „Shopify“, „Drupal“, „Squarespace“ ir „Prestashop“ svetainių temas naudodami šį nemokamą įrankį
short.lv: Izmantojot šo bezmaksas rīku, viegli atrodiet vietņu motīvus WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace un Prestashop
short.ml: ഈ സൗജന്യ ടൂൾ ഉപയോഗിച്ച് WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace, Prestashop എന്നിവയ്‌ക്കായുള്ള വെബ്‌സൈറ്റ് തീമുകൾ എളുപ്പത്തിൽ…
short.mr: वर्डप्रेस, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace आणि Prestashop या मोफत साधनासह वेबसाइट थीम सहज शोधा
short.ms: Kesan tema tapak web dengan mudah untuk WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace dan Prestashop dengan alat percuma ini
short.nl: Detecteer eenvoudig websitethema's voor WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace en Prestashop met deze gratis tool
short.no: Oppdag enkelt nettstedstemaer for WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace og Prestashop med dette gratisverktøyet
short.pl: Dzięki temu bezpłatnemu narzędziu z łatwością wykryj motywy witryn internetowych dla WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace i…
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Detecte facilmente temas de sites para WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace e Prestashop com esta ferramenta gratuita
short.ro: Detectați cu ușurință temele site-ului pentru WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace și Prestashop cu acest instrument gratuit
short.ru: Легко находите темы веб-сайтов для WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace и Prestashop с помощью этого бесплатного инструмента.
short.sk: Pomocou tohto bezplatného nástroja ľahko zistite témy webových stránok pre WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace a Prestashop
short.sl: S tem brezplačnim orodjem preprosto odkrijte teme spletnih mest za WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace in Prestashop
short.sr: Лако откријте теме веб локација за ВордПресс, Схопифи, Друпал, Скуареспаце и Престасхоп помоћу овог бесплатног алата
short.sv: Upptäck enkelt webbplatsteman för WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace och Prestashop med detta gratisverktyg
short.sw: Gundua mada za wavuti kwa WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace na Prestashop kwa urahisi ukitumia zana hii isiyolipishwa.
short.ta: இந்த இலவச கருவி மூலம் WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace மற்றும் Prestashop ஆகியவற்றிற்கான இணையதள தீம்களை எளிதாக கண்டறியலாம்
short.te: ఈ ఉచిత సాధనంతో WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace మరియు Prestashop కోసం వెబ్‌సైట్ థీమ్‌లను సులభంగా గుర్తించండి
short.th: ตรวจจับธีมเว็บไซต์สำหรับ WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace และ Prestashop ได้อย่างง่ายดายด้วยเครื่องมือฟรีนี้
short.tr: Bu ücretsiz araçla WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace ve Prestashop için web sitesi temalarını kolayca tespit edin
short.uk: Легко виявляйте теми веб-сайтів для WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace і Prestashop за допомогою цього безкоштовного…
short.vi: Dễ dàng phát hiện chủ đề trang web cho WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace và Prestashop bằng công cụ miễn phí này
short.zh_CN: 使用此免费工具轻松检测 WordPress、Shopify、Drupal、Squarespace 和 Prestashop 的网站主题
short.zh_TW: 使用此免費工具輕鬆偵測 WordPress、Shopify、Drupal、Squarespace 和 Prestashop 的網站主題

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using WP theme detector extension, learn the theme of a website you are browsing, as well as some other details. It’s also a useful add-on if you’re a WordPress or Shopify or Drupal or Squarespace or Prestashop users and if one day you come across a website design that you like, you don’t have to wonder what theme it was. 


Key Features of WP (WordPress) Theme Detector 

Identifies the theme of any website irrespective of the blogging platform in use whether WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace, Prestashop and many more. 
 

Every theme has the name, version and the author of a theme is displayed here. 
 

Includes a link to the current theme’s webpage for additional information about the topic. 
 

Enables users to see all plugin, extension, and other platform-related information of the website. 

Fully compatible with the websites created with the help of different CMS platforms apart from WordPress only. 


How to Use: 

Download the WordPress Theme Detector add-on to your browser. 


After installation, open any website you want to ascertain the specific theme of. The extension is operable on websites created by WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace, or Prestashop. 
 

Just hover your cursor pointer on the extension icon that appears at the top of the browser. 
 

When activated, the extension should identify the active theme for the website and then display on more information such as the name of the theme and the version, author and of course the rest. 
 

 This comprises of the trends pertaining to the given platform as well as applications for CMS such as WordPress, Drupal, Squarespace, or Prestashop and Shopify 

 

All in all, the WP Theme Detector extension is a resourceful detecting extension for WordPress, Shopify, Drupal, Squarespace, and Prestashop to get information about which website is using that theme and much more.  

As one can see, this extension was designed with a clear and comprehensible interface, which allows getting necessary details about the site’s design and setting in a few clicks.
